.. _beutenkarl-scale:

**********************
The "Beutenkarl" scale
**********************
A scale for measuring hive weight is probably the most important tool
when looking for insights into bee colony behavior by beehive monitoring.


Introduction
============
We have a classic double-H formed scale frame enclosing a
`Bosche H30A single point load cell`_ by Karsten Harazim
and Robert Gummi of `Beutenkarl`_ fame (`facebook <Beutenkarl at Facebook_>`_).

.. figure:: https://ptrace.hiveeyes.org/2016-05-25_Scale%20Frame%20-%2001%20-%20Beutenkarl.jpg
    :alt: Scale frame "Beutenkarl"
    :width: 400px
    :figclass: caption-narrow
    :align: left

    Scale frame "Beutenkarl"

|clearfix|

Results
=======
Amongst others, we have already been able to record the event we aim to detect
automatically in the future, a :ref:`Schwarmalarm <hiveeyes-schwarmalarm-2016-05-20>`
at :ref:`labhive-one` on May 5, 2016:
